scene.name: intro
scene.line: Oh! It's ... wait, who is that? That guy in the hoodie.
What? I've never seen him before.
Really? He looks so damn familiar. I thought maybe he was a former intern or something.
He's a little old for that, right? No, I don't recognize him. Sorry. You're all `deja vu` this morning. It's spooky.
Sorry, just one of those days, I guess.
